reviews.review:
Ingredients
150g salted butter, softened
80g light brown muscovado sugar
80g granulated sugar
2 tsp vanilla extract
1 large egg
225g plain flour
½ tsp bicarbonate of soda
¼ tsp salt
200g plain chocolate chips or chunks
Method
STEP 1
Heat the oven to 190C/fan170C/gas 5 and line two baking sheets with non-stick baking paper.

STEP 2
Put 150g softened salted butter, 80g light brown muscovado sugar and 80g granulated sugar into a bowl and beat until creamy.

STEP 3
Beat in 2 tsp vanilla extract and 1 large egg.

STEP 4
Sift 225g plain flour, ½ tsp bicarbonate of soda and ¼ tsp salt into the bowl and mix it in with a wooden spoon.

STEP 5
Add 200g plain chocolate chips or chunks and stir well.

STEP 6
Use a teaspoon to make small scoops of the mixture, spacing them well apart on the baking trays. This mixture should make about 30 cookies.

STEP 7
Bake for 8–10 mins until they are light brown on the edges and still slightly soft in the centre if you press them.

STEP 8
Leave on the tray for a couple of mins to set and then lift onto a cooling rack.

RECIPE TIPS
FREEZING THE BISCUITS
If you’ve frozen the biscuits, take them out and arrange them on a lined baking sheet. Once defrosted, pop them in a medium oven 190C/170 fan/gas mark 5 and heat for 2-3 mins to crisp up. Don’t leave them too long or they’ll dry out.
STORING DOUGH
You can keep the uncooked dough in a sealed container in the fridge for up to two weeks. Simply take some out, dollop on a lined baking tray and allow to come up to room temperature for 5 mins before baking

QUE ME MATOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOÓ????????

Still to this day the best fps game dealing with hordes of enemies. back in 2008 I thought nothing could touch left4dead it was my favorite game at that time but the moment I played killing floor it changed everything and left4dead couldn't scratch the same itch not even with it's insane mods. the atmosphere and feeling of this game is intoxicating something that it's sequel couldn't replicate. I love Killing floor 2 but it lacks the same charm and challenge as the original. I highly recommend this game to anyone that is slightly curious whether it's on sale or full price it is worth every penny. 

also I may only have 40 hours on this account but I'd play KF1 across old accounts when I'd play it at LAN centers with other people or if I was at a friends place and I used one of their PCs to play it. I always come back to this game every once in a long while and each re visit is as great as it was the first time I booted this game up.

ノートパソコンで遊べるゲームを求めて、過去の記憶を頼りに見つけました。
襲い来るゾンビを味方と協力してバラバラにする爽快感抜群なゲームなのですが…
如何せんJPサーバーが過疎ってます。
ある程度のPCスペックがあればプレイできて、日本語化MODも存在するので気軽に遊んでみてください。

参考までにこのゲームをダウンロードしたノートPCのスペックです。

RAM：8GB
グラフィックボード：Intel(R) UHD Graphics（CPU内蔵のグラボです）

Один з небагатьох шутерів про зомбі який мені сподобався. Головні фічі тут це кооперативне проходження. Кожну хвилю ви разом з друзями(можливість грати аж до 6 гравців) відстрелюєтеся від монстрів. Після чого ви біжете до магазину, де оновлюєте свої запаси патронів, можливо купуєте кращу зброю, і все починається заново. В самому кінці вас очікує бос.

Є можливість прокачки персонажа, причому по декількох категоріях.

Between my other beloved co-op titles that are Left 4 Dead and Deep Rock Galactic, this game is more in the middle. A very janky experience, but I've long since acquired the taste and can enjoy it for what it is.

But seriously, it has among the most quotable voice acting of any game I've ever played, stacking up to Valve's standard of quality. Repeat after me... IT'S RAINING MONEEEEYY!!!!

CLASSIC ZOMIE SHOTTER

Better than KF2 for me! This game is an all time classic. While it initially feels like a game made by someone who just figured out how to develop games, since the AI is super primitive, the game play is addictive and excellent. Partly due to the VERY LONG upgrade system and a million achievements and the multiplayer aspect. There is skill involved and you need to make the right strategy to survive on harder difficulties. It's a weird game. My style was very campy and I cleared all map achievements I'm pretty sure on all difficulties. Some people preferred to run around the map (kiting), which was usually slower than camping but saved lost matches. There is still a vibrant community, even though it is such an old game. Just make sure you have VPN turned off/reset or you probably won't find a game. I had a blast on this for like 500 hours, even though the first time I played it I thought it was trash! This game has some of the coolest gun animations in any game ever! And don't forget chicken man.
Man with chainsaw scary

Active community, didn't have problems finding games at all even when the game is so old

Very fun game to play with friends, the voicelines are hilariously out of character for a horror game, but that just adds it's unique charm to it.

You can share your DLC weapons with people that don't have that DLC purchased, which is real nice if you want to save up money.

Overall 9/10, very fun experience and worth the price.

Very fun zombie survival game. Lots of different perks with unique traits to choose from, lots of different maps, multiple different game modes, and the ability to customize settings of matches you host. Also, the ability to create addons for the game is really nice as well.

I just wish it didn't feel like I was playing as an old man when it comes to how slow I move, given that you are unable to run in this game...I literally can't escape from any zombies 90% of the time! The game has some other minor problems in my opinion, but none too serious to mention here.
